title: Bubble Bath, Bourbon, and Berries
itunes:title: Bubble Bath, Bourbon, and Berries
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley my husband and I’ve been married for two years and when I met him, he came from out of nowhere. I do not know anyone that knows him and could vouch for his character. I knew he’d been married before and I found who she was and how she looked and carried herself. On social media, she was dressed ghetto and she loved multi-colored wigs but she’s a nurse so she must be professional at times...................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley my husband and I’ve been married for two years and when I met him, he came from out of nowhere. I do not know anyone that knows him and could vouch for his character. I knew he’d been married before and I found who she was and how she looked and carried herself. On social media, she was dressed ghetto and she loved multi-colored wigs but she’s a nurse so she must be professional at times...................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
